snippet: Howard scored 32 points and grabbed 16 rebounds as the Houston Rockets won, 98-81, over the visiting San Antonio Spurs, who were missing Tim Duncan, Tiago Splitter and Manu Ginobili.
abstract: Houston Rockets beat San Antonio Spurs, 98-81; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Howard scored 32 points and grabbed 16 rebounds as the Houston Rockets won, 98-81, over the visiting San Antonio Spurs, who were missing Tim Duncan, Tiago Splitter and Manu Ginobili.

headline.main: Dwight Howard Leads Rockets Over Spurs
